programme.title: Stroheim luta com Kars em seu novo corpo mecânico. Joseph e Kars caem de um precipício na tentativa de conseguir a Pedra Vermelha.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Caesar chega ao esconderijo do inimigo, e agora ele tem um novo tipo de ataque. Lisa Lisa revela seu passado a Joseph.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Lisa Lisa e Joseph descobrem que Wamuu e Kars esperam por eles no hotel com uma centena de vampiros aliados, e ela elabora um plano inteligente para tirá-los dali.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Em uma arena antiga, Joseph e Wamuu disputam uma corrida de bigas até a morte. Mesmo escolhendo a primeira arma, Joseph se vê em uma situação perigosa.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Joseph usa a bandana de Caesar para se defender do ataque final de Wamuu. Lisa Lisa desafia Kars para um combate nas ruínas do templo.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Em Busca do Castelo Dourado, (2019, Action)
programme.desc: Quando o rei e a rainha são envenenados, os irmãos Per e Pal são presos suspeitos do crime. O caçula da família, Espen Ash Lad e a princesa Kristin embarcam em uma perigosa jornada em busca do lendário castelo Soria Moria e da fonte da Água da Vida

programme.title: Tudo Pela Honra, (2003, Adventure)
programme.desc: O habilidoso espadachim e mulherengo Fanfan La Tulipe é obrigado a se juntar ao exército do rei Luís XV pela trambiqueira Adeline La Franchise , que o convence dizendo que assim se casará com uma das filhas do rei.

programme.title: Arthur & Merlin: Cavaleiros de Camelot, (2020, Adventure)
programme.desc: Um Rei Arthur muito mais velho retorna para casa após lutar contra o Império Romano. Seu filho ilegítimo corrompeu o trono de Camelot. Agora o Rei Arthur deve se reunir com o mago Merlin e os Cavaleiros da Távola Redonda e lutar para recuperar sua coroa.

programme.title: Ragnarok, (2013, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Um arqueólogo fica obcecado pelos escritos encontrados em um navio viking, que podem solucionar o mistério de Ragnarok Porém, durante suas buscas, ele acaba despertando acidentalmente um monstro gigantesco.

programme.title: O Garoto Formiga 3, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: A Exofarm tem um novo CEO e quer controlar o mundo. Antboy, um menino de 12 anos, Pelle, que é mordido por uma formiga e desenvolve superpoderes, tenta impedi-la.

programme.title: Aventura Em Duas Rodas, (2019, Adventure)
programme.desc: Quando o maior castelo da Inglaterra é roubado por um notório chefe do crime, a última coisa que ele e sua gangue esperam é ter que enfrentar Sam e Jake, dois garotos em suas bicicletas.

programme.title: Pequenos Espiões 4, (2011, Action)
programme.desc: Marisa Cortez Wilson é casada com Wilbur, um repórter conhecido por desmascarar espiões, e com ele tem um bebê e duas crianças. O que o marido não sabe é que a esposa é uma ex-espiã, que decidiu largar a carreira para se dedicar à família.

programme.title: Os Piratas da Rua de Baixo, (2020, Foreign Action & Adventure)
programme.desc: Quando uma família de piratas se muda para a chata Sandsborough, os vizinhos não ficam muito felizes. Michiel e seu novo amigo pirata Billy tentam fazer com que a família se misture, mas seu arquiinimigo chega à cidade e planeja roubar um tesouro.

programme.title: O Garoto Formiga 3, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: A Exofarm tem um novo CEO e quer controlar o mundo. Antboy, um menino de 12 anos, Pelle, que é mordido por uma formiga e desenvolve superpoderes, tenta impedi-la.

programme.title: Aventura Em Duas Rodas, (2019, Adventure)
programme.desc: Quando o maior castelo da Inglaterra é roubado por um notório chefe do crime, a última coisa que ele e sua gangue esperam é ter que enfrentar Sam e Jake, dois garotos em suas bicicletas.

programme.title: O Monge à Prova de Balas, (2020, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: Baseado em uma história em quadrinhos "underground", ele conta a história de um monge tibetano imortal -Chow- que se torna o mentor de um jovem menino de rua -Scott-, a quem ele ensina a proteger um velho pergaminho que o monge cuidou durante anos.

programme.title: Ninja, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: Casey é um garoto apaixonado pela filosofia ninja, ele o leva ao Japão para estudar Ninjutsu. Sua instrução progride e seu sensei o envia para Nova York para proteger o lendário Yoroi Bitsu, um baú blindado contendo as armas do último Ninja Koga.

programme.title: Hitman - O Rei dos Assassinos, (1998, Action)
programme.desc: Um antigo chefe da máfia japonesa suspeita de ser vítima de um ataque e deixa uma recompensa para a pessoa que encontrar o seu assassino.

programme.title: Olhos de Dragão, (2012, Action)
programme.desc: Hong usa sua visão moral e habilidades para lutar e salvar um bairro de traficantes de drogas e policiais corruptos.

programme.title: Dragões para Sempre, (1988, Action)
programme.desc: Jackie é contratado para defender uma empresa acusada de poluir as águas da cidade. Ao descobrir que eles produzem drogas, Jackie decide mudar de lado.​

programme.title: O Legado Do Grande Mestre, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Mantendo-se discreto depois de ter sido derrotado por Ip Man, Cheung Tin Chi mete-se em sarilhos depois de se envolver numa luta com um estrangeiro poderoso.

programme.title: O Monge à Prova de Balas, (2020, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: Baseado em uma história em quadrinhos "underground", ele conta a história de um monge tibetano imortal -Chow- que se torna o mentor de um jovem menino de rua -Scott-, a quem ele ensina a proteger um velho pergaminho que o monge cuidou durante anos.

programme.title: Ninja, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: Casey é um garoto apaixonado pela filosofia ninja, ele o leva ao Japão para estudar Ninjutsu. Sua instrução progride e seu sensei o envia para Nova York para proteger o lendário Yoroi Bitsu, um baú blindado contendo as armas do último Ninja Koga.

programme.title: Hitman - O Rei dos Assassinos, (1998, Action)
programme.desc: Um antigo chefe da máfia japonesa suspeita de ser vítima de um ataque e deixa uma recompensa para a pessoa que encontrar o seu assassino.

programme.title: Kickboxer: A Retaliação, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Kurt Sloan prometeu a si mesmo que não voltaria para a Tailândia, mas alguém o seda e o força a retornar ao país asiático.

programme.title: The Odd Couple, (1968, Comedy)
programme.desc: Two divorced men decide to share a New York apartment. Fussy Felix, fastidious to a fault. He proves that cleanliness is next to insanity. And Oscar, who wreaks havoc on a tidy room with the speed and thoroughness of a tornado.

programme.title: The Pink Panther, (1964, Comedy)
programme.desc: In this riotously funny farce, Peter Sellers introduced the world to Jacques Clouseau, the clumsiest Inspector ever to trip over a case, who is out to stop the notorious Phantom (David Niven) from stealing the priceless Pink Panther diamond!

programme.title: A Shot in the Dark, (1964, Comedy)
programme.desc: Peter Sellers and Elke Sommer star in this successful sequel to The Pink Panther in which Inspector Clouseau tries to prove a beautiful parlor maid is innocent of killing her chauffer lover.

programme.title: The Return of the Pink Panther, (1975, Comedy)
programme.desc: The hilarious, accidentally brilliant Inspector Clouseau once again takes on his archenemy, the insane Dreyfus, as he plots to control the world.

programme.title: The Tomb Of Ligeia, (1965, Horror)
programme.desc: Vincent Price is a man haunted by his past. In this case, the past comes in the form of his now-deceased first wife Ligeia, who casts a shadow over an ill-advised second marriage, especially when Ligeia’s spirit returns in the form of a black cat.

programme.title: Charade, (1963, Thriller)
programme.desc: Romance and suspense ensue in Paris as a woman is pursued by several men who want a fortune her murdered husband had stolen. Whom can she trust?

programme.title: My Friend Irma, (1949, Comedy)
programme.desc: A slapsticky saga related by a comparatively bright brunette dishing the dirt about her dumb blonde roommate. Dean Martin and Jerry Lewis's movie debut.

programme.title: My Friend Irma Goes West, (1950, Comedy)
programme.desc: Singer Steve, friend Seymour and fiance Jane, along with her dizzy blonde room mate Irma, have a series of misadventures on a California-bound train and end up involved with a gang of murderous gangsters in Las Vegas.

programme.title: Takers, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: After pulling off a spectacular series of bank heists, the TAKERS plan a once-in-a-lifetime job with a $25 million payoff. And all that stands in their way is a cop hell-bent on doing whatever it takes to solve the case and bring them down.

programme.title: Angel Has Fallen, (2019, Action)

programme.title: Bad Ass, (2012, Action Comedies)

programme.title: The Reading, (2023, Thriller)

programme.desc: The exam for the First Phase consists of following Satotz, the proctor to the site of the Second Phase.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Jotaro Kujo! Meets Josuke Higashikata
programme.desc: In April 1999, Jotaro Kujo travels to a town in Japan called Morioh to find a young man named Josuke Higashikata, the secret love child of his grandfather, Joseph Joestar. Upon finding him, Jotaro is surprised to learn that Josuke also possesses a Stand.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Josuke Higashikata! Meets Angelo
programme.desc: Josuke informs Jotaro about his encounter with Angelo’s Stand. Deducing that the serial killer’s Stand is capable of entering people’s bodies, Jotaro tells Josuke over the phone to stay on high alert until he arrives at his home.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: The Nijimura Brothers, Part 1
programme.desc: Josuke and Jotaro learn that a man with a bow and arrow was responsible for awakening Angelo’s Stand ability. Realizing the town is still in danger, they decide to find the bow and arrow before it can create any more victims.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: The Nijimura Brothers, Part 2
programme.desc: Josuke enters the Nijimura Brothers’ house to rescue Koichi, who is in critical condition after getting shot by Keicho Nijimura’s bow and arrow. But when Josuke steps into the house, he is attacked by Keicho’s Stand.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: The Nijimura Brothers, Part 3
programme.desc: After defeating Keicho, Koichi insists they find the bow and arrow and destroy it. Josuke agrees, but when the two enter the attic where the bow and arrow are being kept, they hear an inhuman noise inside.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Koichi Hirose (Reverb)
programme.desc: On his way to school, Koichi finds himself blackmailed by a man named Tamami Kobayashi, who frames him for running over a cat. A panicked Koichi starts to feel guilty for his actions when suddenly a giant lock appears on his chest!

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Toshikazu Hazamada (Show Off)
programme.desc: Josuke and Koichi get info that a student at their school, Toshikazu Hazamada may be a Stand user and decide to look into the case. Their suspicions are quickly confirmed after Hazamada’s wooden doll morphs into an exact copy of Josuke and attacks them.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Yukako Yamagishi Falls in Love, Part 1
programme.desc: Koichi is both surprised and excited when a girl named Yukako Yamagishi says she likes him. But Koichi’s joy quickly turns into fear after Yukako begins to express her love for him in very erratic and dangerous ways.
programme.sub-title: Yukako Yamagishi Falls in Love, Part 1

programme.desc: When a gang of bank robbers makes a run for the border, they wander into the wrong bar and mess with the wrong vampires. It's kill-or-be-killed in the ultimate battle to stop these evil creatures and save their own lives!

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn 3: Hangman's Daughter, (1999, Horror)
programme.desc: Set in Mexico in the early 1900s, this prequel to the From Dusk Till Dawn series finds outlaw Johnny Madrid on the run from the hangman, with the hangman's daughter Esmeralda by his side. Together they are faced with the fight of their lives.

programme.title: F/X, (1986, Thriller)
programme.desc: Rollie Tyler, a movie special-effects man, accepts $30,000 from the Justice Department's Witness Relocation Program to stage the fake assassination of a mob figure who has agreed to name names.

programme.title: Day of the Dead, (1985, Zombies)
programme.desc: A small group of military officers and scientists dwell in an underground bunker as the world above is overrun by zombies.

programme.title: Cube, (1997, Thriller)
programme.desc: Seven complete strangers of widely varying personality characteristics are involuntarily placed in an endless maze containing deadly traps.

programme.title: Doppelganger, (1993, Creature Features)
programme.desc: A writer with a room for rent acquires a strange new roommate with a psychotic alter-ego that follows her wherever she goes.

programme.title: Carrie, (2002, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: Angela Bettis stars in this adaptation of Stephen King's classic tale of horror. Carrie White has been cursed with the power of telekinesis and when her tormenters commit an act of unforgivable humiliation, they'll soon learn a deadly lesson.

programme.title: May, (2003, Horror)
programme.desc:
May grew up as a lonely oddball whose only friend was a perfectly kept doll. When she moves to L.A., she takes up with a handsome filmmaker and then an alluring lesbian, but every connection she makes turns out deadly.
Rated R

programme.title: The Faculty, (1998, Teen Screams)
programme.desc: A group of small-town high school students discovers their teachers are under the control of mind-controlling alien parasites. From a smart script by Kevin Williamson (SCREAM), and directed by action-expert Robert Rodriguez (FROM DUSK TO DAWN).

programme.title: Monkey Shines: An Experiment in Fear, (1988, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Injected with human brain cells, a super-intelligent female monkey is enlisted to help a wheelchair-bound quadriplegic get on with his life.

programme.title: Cujo, (1983, Horror)
programme.desc: While Donna and Vic Trenton struggle to save their rocky marriage, their son Tad befriends the loveable 200-lb St. Bernard who belongs to their mechanic.

programme.title: Maximum Overdrive, (1986, Horror)
programme.desc: After a mysterious comet turns every machine on Earth into a homicidal rampage device, the survivors at the Dixie Boy Truck Stop are making a stand, and human vengeance goes into overdrive.

programme.title: Beyond Re-Animator, (2003, Science fiction)
programme.desc:
After causing a massacre, Dr. Herbert West has been serving a prison sentence for 14 years. When a new young doctor comes to work as the prison Dr. West discovers the young protege has something he left behind 14 years ago.
Rated R

programme.title: Winnie The Pooh: Blood and Honey, (2022, Horror)
programme.desc: Winnie-The-Pooh: Blood and Honey follows Pooh and Piglet as they go on a rampage after Christopher Robin abandons them.

programme.title: Faceless After Dark, (2024, Horror)
programme.desc: Following her breakout success as the star of a killer clown horror flick, Bowie now finds herself struggling to capitalize on its success. But when she is held hostage by an unhinged fan posing as that same killer clown, horror becomes her reality.

programme.title: Stripes, (1981, Comedy)
programme.desc: Bill Murray has joined the Army, and the Army will never be the same! When John Winger (Murray) loses his job, his car, his apartment and his girlfriend, all in one day, he decides he only has one option: volunteer for Uncle Sam.

programme.title: Ghostbusters, (1984, Comedy)
programme.desc: A trio of university parasychologists lose their research grant and decide to open their own business, "Ghostbusters," and almost at once are summoned to investigate the strange happenings in a Central Park West apartment.

programme.title: Ghostbusters II, (1989, Comedy)
programme.desc: Directed by Ivan Reitman. Starring Bill Murray, Dan Aykroyd, Sigourney Weaver, Harold Ramis, Rick Moranis, Annie Potts. The ghostbusters attempt to rid New York City from the slime and negative energy that plagues it.

programme.title: First Blood, (1982, Action)
programme.desc: A soft-spoken Vietnam vet drifts into a small town looking for no trouble, but finds it in the form of a psychotic local sheriff who finds pleasure in hating him for no reason.

programme.title: Rambo: First Blood Part II, (1985, Action)
programme.desc: John Rambo is sent on assignment back to Southeast Asia to uncover evidence of still missing POWs, and ends up with his hands full when he comes up against Vietnamese soldiers still guarding the camps.

programme.title: Rambo III, (1988, Action)
programme.desc: Rambo refuses to join his friend and former mentor, Colonel Trautman, on a mission to Afghanistan. The mission fails and Trautman is captured by Russian troops. Now Rambo must infiltrate the Russian fortress to save his only friend.

programme.title: Jagged Edge, (1985, Thriller)
programme.desc: A grisly homicide, a sensational trial, a forbidden affair it's JAGGED EDGE, a razor-sharp suspense thriller about crime, punishment and passion. Jeff Bridges is the prime suspect and Glenn Close plays the attorney who falls in love with him. rated -R

programme.title: Christine, (1983, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: Based on the novel by Stephen King, CHRISTINE tells the story of a 1957 Plymouth that takes on human characteristics.

programme.title: Scrooged, (1988, Comedy)
programme.desc: Frank Cross is a mean TV executive with perfect qualities of a modern-day Scrooge. Before the night is over, he'll be visited by three ghosts from the past, present and future.

programme.title: Crocodile Dundee II, (1988, Comedy)
programme.desc: Just as the eccentric Australian is starting to adjust to life in New York City, Dundee and his beautiful girlfriend (Linda Kozlowski) are targeted for death by a gang of ruthless drug dealers.

programme.title: Crocodile Dundee In Los Angeles, (2001, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: Crocodile Dundee returns in this hilarious third installment of the beloved film series. After Mick's girlfriend, Sue, is assigned to the L.A. bureau of her father's newspaper, Mick, Sue and their son Mikey head to Hollywood.

programme.title: Top Gun, (1986, Action)
programme.desc: Tom Cruise is superb as Maverick Mitchell, a young flyer who's out to become the best. And Kelly McGillis plays the instructor who teaches Maverick a few things you can't learn in a classroom.

programme.title: Fat Man and Little Boy, (1989, War)
programme.desc: In the remote desert of New Mexico, “The Manhattan Project” is materializing – the World War II effort to build the atomic bomb.

programme.title: Clear and Present Danger, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: When his mentor Admiral James Greer becomes ill, Ryan is appointed acting CIA Director of Intelligence.

programme.title: Crocodile Dundee, (1986, Comedy)
programme.desc: Michael J. Crocodile Dundee is a free-spirited Australian who hunts crocodiles with his bare hands, stares down giant water buffaloes, and drinks mere mortals under the table.

programme.title: Top Gun, (1986, Action)
programme.desc: Tom Cruise is superb as Maverick Mitchell, a young flyer who's out to become the best. And Kelly McGillis plays the instructor who teaches Maverick a few things you can't learn in a classroom.

programme.title: Fat Man and Little Boy, (1989, War)
programme.desc: In the remote desert of New Mexico, “The Manhattan Project” is materializing – the World War II effort to build the atomic bomb.

programme.title: The Whole Nine Yards, (2000, Comedy)
programme.desc: An unhappy dentist in Montreal gets a new neighbor, Jimmy 'The Tulip' Teduski, a former mob hitman turned informant with a price on his head.

programme.title: Running Scared, (2005, Drama)
programme.desc: In the fast-paced crime drama Running Scared, Paul Walker plays a low-level mobster who, in order to save his family, must recover a gun used in a mob hit before it's found by his bosses or the cops.

programme.title: Pulp Fiction, (1994, Thriller)
programme.desc: Writer-director Quentin Tarantino delivers an iconic cast of characters in PULP FICTION, a wildly entertaining tale of violence and redemption. John Travolta, Samuel L. Jackson, Uma Thurman, and Bruce Willis star in this pop culture phenomenon.

programme.title: Double Jeopardy, (1999, Thriller)
programme.desc: Libby Parsons, who discovers that the husband she’s convicted of murdering staged his own “death” and framed her for the crime. Released on parole, she skips town to find him–and that puts parole officer Travis Lehman on her trail.

programme.title: Killing Them Softly, (2012, Crime)
programme.desc: During the economic turmoil of 2008, Jackie Cogan (Brad Pitt), an enforcer, is hired to restore order after three idiots rob a mob-protected poker game.

programme.title: The Usual Suspects, (1995, Thriller)
programme.desc: A gruesome scene adorns a pier in San Pedro, south of Los Angeles. Twenty-seven dead bodies. A burned-out ship smoldering in the harbor.

programme.title: Hoodlum, (1997, Action)
programme.desc: 1930's New York. The black community of Harlem faces the same indignities as countless millions of refugees. If the seeds of Harlem's urban power would not grow in the White city, the Black underground would form to take control.

programme.title: Son of a Gun, (2015, Action)
programme.desc: JR, a teenage criminal, is locked up for a minor crime and forced to adapt to the harsh realities of prison life. Brendan Lynch (Ewan McGregor), one of Australia's most notorious criminals, offers JR protection, but it comes with a price.

programme.title: Captive, The, (2014, Thriller)
programme.desc: A man (Ryan Reynolds) finds himself immersed in the complex web of deceit that surrounds the mysterious disappearance of his daughter.

programme.title: The Spectacular Now, (2013, Drama)
programme.desc: Effortless charmer Sutter Keely (Miles Teller) unexpectedly falls for "good girl" Aimee Finnicky (Shailene Woodley) in this authentic and charming portrait about the perilous business of young love and growing up.

programme.title: When You Finish Saving the World, (2023, Dramedy)
programme.desc: Evelyn (Julianne Moore) tries to parent an unassuming teenager at her shelter while her oblivious son Ziggy (Finn Wolfhard) fumbles through his pursuit of a brilliant young woman at school.

programme.title: While We're Young, (2015, Dramedy)
programme.desc: Josh and Cornelia, happily married middle-aged creatives in NYC, have given up on starting a family. When they meet a free-spirited young couple, Josh and Cornelia throw aside friends their own age to trail after the uninhibited hipsters.

programme.title: Zola, (2021, Thriller)
programme.desc: A waitress, strikes up a friendship with a customer, who seduces her to join a weekend in Florida. What seems like a glamorous trip transforms into a journey involving a pimp, a boyfriend, gangsters and adventures in this see-it-to-believe-it tale.

programme.title: Under the Silver Lake, (2019, Comedy)
programme.desc: When his beautiful, mysterious neighbor disappears without a trace, Sam (Andrew Garfield) tries to find the parties responsible, unraveling a string of strange crimes, unsolved murders, & bizarre coincidences in his East L.A. neighborhood.

programme.title: Beat Street, (1984, Musical)
programme.desc: Urban ghetto kids from the South Bronx find creative outlets in painting graffiti, breakdancing, rapping, and developing new disco D.J. routines.

programme.title: Breakin' 2: Electric Boogaloo, (1984, Musical)
programme.desc: The beat doesn't slow down in this slammin' sequel to "Breakin'.'" This fly follow-up finds our poppin' and lockin' trio Kelly, Ozone and Turbo trying to rescue a community center facing demolition at the hands of a greedy real-estate developer.

programme.title: Sleepy Hollow, (1999, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Johnny Depp is Ichabod Crane, an investigator determined to stop the murderous Headless Horseman.

programme.title: Jennifer Eight, (1992, Thriller)
programme.desc: They are the unidentified victims of an unsolved death spree, women linked by a killer’s gruesome handiwork and by police files giving them the code name “Jennifer.”

programme.title: Bound, (1995, Thriller)
programme.desc: Caesar’s a guy who launders money for the mob. What’s the last thing that would come between a sleazy wise guy like Caesar and that money? A couple of women with brains to die for and bodies to match.

programme.title: Basic Instinct, (1992, Thriller)
programme.desc: San Francisco detective Nick Curran is investigating the murder of a once-celebrated rock star, and he's made a few unsettling discoveries: a bloody ice pick, a white silk scarf tied to a bedpost, and evidence of an otherwise romantic evening.

programme.title: Jennifer Eight, (1992, Thriller)
programme.desc: They are the unidentified victims of an unsolved death spree, women linked by a killer’s gruesome handiwork and by police files giving them the code name “Jennifer.”

programme.title: Bound, (1995, Thriller)
programme.desc: Caesar’s a guy who launders money for the mob. What’s the last thing that would come between a sleazy wise guy like Caesar and that money? A couple of women with brains to die for and bodies to match.

programme.title: Basic Instinct, (1992, Thriller)
programme.desc: San Francisco detective Nick Curran is investigating the murder of a once-celebrated rock star, and he's made a few unsettling discoveries: a bloody ice pick, a white silk scarf tied to a bedpost, and evidence of an otherwise romantic evening.

programme.title: The Killer Elite, (1975, Action)
programme.desc: James Caan and Robert Duvall star in Sam Peckinpah's tense, action-packed thriller that explores savagery and betrayal in the murky world of killers-for-hire.

programme.title: The Gambler, (1974, Thriller)
programme.desc: James Caan portrays a compulsive gambler who can't quit or win. He falls into debt to the mob for $40,000 but seems to relish the thrill of gambling against the long shot.

programme.title: Rolling Thunder, (1977, Action)
programme.desc: William Devane and Tommy Lee Jones star as two former P.O.W.s out for revenge in this neo-noir action-thriller that Quentin Tarantino cites as one of his favorite films. Written by genre masters Paul Schrader and Heywood Gould. John Flynn directs.

programme.title: Death Wish, (1974, Action)
programme.desc: In this explosive story of revenge and urban violence, Charles Bronson plays Paul Kersey, a bleeding-heart liberal who has a change of opinion after his wife and daughter are violently attacked by a gang of thugs in their apartment.

programme.title: White Lightning, (1973, Action)
programme.desc: In one of his most memorable roles, Burt Reynolds portrays a moonshine whiskey runner who turns state's witness to avenge the murder of a boy no one understood.

programme.title: The Gambler, (1974, Thriller)
programme.desc: James Caan portrays a compulsive gambler who can't quit or win. He falls into debt to the mob for $40,000 but seems to relish the thrill of gambling against the long shot.

programme.title: Comes a Horseman, (1978, Western)
programme.desc: Set in the American West of the 1940s, a pair of little-guy ranchers join forces against the depredations of a ruthless land baron determined to expand his empire at whatever cost. Starring Jane Fonda, James Caan, and Jason Robards.

programme.title: The Boys From Brazil, (1978, Thriller)
programme.desc: A Nazi hunter in Paraguay discovers a sinister and bizarre plot to rekindle the Third Reich.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Kaiba are on a rescue mission to save their friends. But along the way, all their worries and secrets are revealed as they relive the troubles they've faced and will face in the future.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's friend versus friend as Marik mind controls Joey to duel against Yugi. The loser will be dragged into the ocean to sleep with the fishes!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Though Joey decimates Yugi's life points, Yugi can't bring himself to attack his dear friend. Yugi summons Joey's favorite monster Red-Eyes Black Dragon to bring Joey back to his senses.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi starts to break Marik's spell over Joey, but he now must duel without the Millennium Puzzle.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: There's only one minute left in the duel before the loser is sent plummeting to the depths of the sea. Will these best friends actually send each other to their doom?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the battle of the ghouls as Bakura unleashes his army of ghosts against Bonz's zealous zombies for the right to enter the Battle City finals. But for whom will the final bell toll when this duel is played in the Shadow Realm?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the game of love as Hollywood heartthrob Jean-Claude Magnum challenges Mai to a duel in order to win her hand in marriage.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Let the Battle City finals begin! The eight finalists have their skill and endurance put to the ultimate test in a dueling arena thousands of feet in the sky.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the first duel of the Battle City finals as Yugi squares off against the evil spirit of the Millennium Ring who possessed Bakura. Yugi quickly disposes of Bakura's grotesque ghouls, but Bakura has a sinister strategy straight from the graveyard.
programme.sub-title: The Dark Spirit Revealed: Yugi Vs. Bakura Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Bakura activates Destiny Board, which will cause Yugi to lose automatically in five turns. If that's not bad enough, Bakura's Dark Sanctuary damages Yugi's Life Points every time Yugi attacks. Unable to attack and running out of time, Yugi's trapped.
programme.sub-title: The Dark Spirit Revealed: Yugi Vs. Bakura Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's Slifer the Sky Dragon is about to unleash the final blow to win the duel, but Bakura may not survive the blast from the almighty Egyptian God Monster. Will Yugi attack and advance in the finals or will he surrender to save Bakura's life?
programme.sub-title: The Dark Spirit Revealed: Yugi Vs. Bakura Part 3

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The origin of the Egyptian God Cards is finally revealed. The mysterious Shadi takes Yugi on a journey back in time to the creation of Duel Monsters… and the dangerous powers it released.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In the second duel of the Battle City finals, Odion, disguised as Marik, befuddles Joey with numerous traps to bring the duel to a stalemate. However, Joey has Giant Trunade, the perfect counter to Odion's strategy.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Odion's Embodiments of Apophis run roughshod over Joey's monsters and his Life Points. Can Joey effectively utilize the monsters he won earlier in the tournament, or is he too flustered to mount a successful counterattack?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's a feeding frenzy as Odion's Mystical Beast Selket devours Joey's monsters to morph into greater and powerful stages of evolution! How can Joey defeat Selket when it ingests Joey's monsters whenever they're summoned on to the field?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Odion uses a phony Egyptian God Card to summon the third Egyptian God Monster, The Winged Dragon of Ra, targeted to annihilate the rest of Joey's Life Points.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The third duel of the Battle City finals between Mai and Marik is no ordinary duel; it's a battle in the dreaded Shadow Realm where losing Life Points equals losing your memories.
programme.sub-title: Mind Game Part 1: Mai vs. Marik

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: As Mai loses more memories under Marik's relentless assault, she loses confidence in her dueling abilities. Will Yugi and friends' never-ending support bring her back to victory, or will her shattered mind be trapped in the Shadow Realm for eternity?
programme.sub-title: Mind Game Part 2: Mai vs. Marik

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mai gains control of Marik's The Winged Dragon of Ra, but she's unable to decipher how to unleash its massively powerful abilities. Can Mai solve the mystery of the Egyptian God Card before Marik solves it himself?
programme.sub-title: Mind Game Part 3: Mai vs. Marik

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In the fourth duel of the Battle City finals, Kaiba's mystery opponent is Ishizu. With the power of her Millennium Necklace, Ishizu can see the future, including every card Kaiba is planning to play.
programme.sub-title: A Duel with Destiny Part 1: Kaiba vs. Ishizu

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Ishizu, using the magic of her Millennium Necklace, has already seen the outcome of the duel: she will defeat Kaiba with sacrifice's blast! How can Kaiba win when it's predestined that he will lose? Kaiba must change the future!
programme.sub-title: A Duel with Destiny Part 2: Kaiba vs. Ishizu

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: As Marik's evil grows, Ishizu reveals the secrets of her bloodline: How did Marik transform from a kind child into a power-hungry tyrant out for world domination? Can Yugi save Marik from the edge of darkness, or is he already beyond salvation?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: With their previous pact broken, Bakura duels Marik for the right to control the Millennium Rod and Millennium Ring, with the loser being trapped inside the Shadow Realm forever. To tip the odds, Bakura gains an unexpected ally… another Marik?
programme.sub-title: Showdown in the Shadows Part 1: Marik Vs. Bakura

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Bakura and good Marik summon The Winged Dragon of Ra, ready to blast and banish evil Marik into the Shadow Realm. But The Winged Dragon of Ra has more than one special ability, and evil Marik knows how to use them all.
programme.sub-title: Showdown in the Shadows Part 2: Marik Vs. Bakura

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba's blimp is hijacked by a mysterious boy named Noah and his henchmen - five familiar foes from Yugi and Kaiba's past who are out for revenge!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The first to duel under the all-new Deck Master System is Yugi against Big 1 Gansley's Deepsea Warrior! Can Yugi master the complex new rules, or will the rules master him?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: As Yugi struggles to make heads or tails of the Deck Master System, Big 1 uses his Deck Master ability to send all of Yugi's attacks right back! How can Yugi defeat an opponent when his attacks take away his own life points?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's running out of life points, but can his cute little Deck Master Kuriboh unleash his furry fury to turn the tide of battle?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Prepare for a feathered fight when Téa squares off against Big 2 Crump's Nightmare Penguin where the loser will be trapped forever in a block of ice!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: As Téa's body turns more and more into a giant popsicle, can she keep her brain from freezing to find a way to melt Big 2's strategy? Or will Big 2's penguin horde waddle all over her?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey squares off against the judicial jerk Big 3 Johnson who takes the Deck Master form of Judge Man! How can Joey defeat a foe who can destroy Joey's monsters at will?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Just when Joey seems to gain the upper hand, he hits the longest streak of bad luck in the history of mankind! Has Joey's fortunes finally run out, or is a crooked judge ignoring the rules of the law?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Big 4 Nezbitt challenges Duke, Tristan, and Serenity for the right to gain control of three bodies at once! Will Serenity's errors cost her team the ultimate price when Tristan and Duke can't cover for her mistakes?

programme.title: Craving red-bean soup, Big Mom attacks Queen, the Animal Kingdom Pirates' Lead Performer who reins over Udon. However, when she finds out that the pot is empty, she turns her wrath against the one who ate it all: Luffy.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Grudge Over Red-bean Soup! Luffy Gets into a Desperate Situation!

programme.title: After finding out that Luffy ate the whole pot ofthe red-bean soup that she was looking for, Big Mom becomes infuriated and goesafter him. Meanwhile, Queen, the Lead Performer, comes up with a plan to stopthe rampaging Big Mom.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Stop the Emperor of the Sea! Queen's Secret Plan!

programme.title: Queen hastily ties up the sleeping Big Mom and carries her to Onigashima leaving Udon to Babanuki. Babanuki uses a weapon that Queen made to threaten inmates and make them catch Luffy, but a mysterious figure emerges from the forbidden cell to save Luffy.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Brutal Ammunition! The Plague Rounds Aim at Luffy!

programme.title: Kawamatsu the Kappa is freed and stands up against Babanuki and his underlings! Listening to Old Man Hyo's suggestion, Raizo and Kiku reveal their true identities which give the desperate prisoners not only a shock but also some hope.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Start Fighting Back! Luffy and the Akazaya Samurai!

programme.title: Luffy faces those who are infected by the Plague Rounds and the non-infected prisoners who submit to the authority of Udon. To open their eyes, Luffy takes a measure that will risk his life. However, the Chief Warden Babanuki has something up his sleeve.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: We’re Here to Win! Luffy's Desperate Scream!

programme.title: The freed prisoners in Udon refuse to fight alongside Luffy because he is a pirate. Raizo and Old Man Hyo try their best to convince them, but an unexpected person stands up to bring the prisoners hope after taking down Kaido!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Warriors' Dream! Luffy's Conquer of Udon!

programme.title: After standing against Orochi, Zoro and Hiyori are chased by Orochi's ninja group. Meanwhile, Orochi is told that they captured Trafalgar Law as the people of the Flower Capital prepare for the upcoming Fire Festival.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Orochi's Hunting Party! The Ninja Group vs. Zoro!

programme.title: Nami and Franky join Kanjuro who has taken Yasuie's dead body to bury him with Oden, and together they hit the road. Robin, Usopp, and Brook are at the dock trying to figure out a way to pass through a check point.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Tension Rises in Onigashima! Two Emperors of the Sea Meet?!

programme.title: As the clash between Kaido and Big Mom continues, Queen looks for a way to get out of Onigashima. Meanwhile in Udon, Old Man Hyo finds his former allies, four bosses from each region.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Hiyori's Confession! A Reunion at Bandit's Bridge!

programme.title: Zoro runs after the warrior-monk who took his Shusui and Kawamatsu shares with Hiyori his memory of a fox that was guarding the graves in Ringo. As they catch up to Zoro, they find a room filled with swords.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Its Name is Enma! Oden's Great Swords!

programme.title: As the day of the raid approaches, Law finds someone who might help him escape the prison and Kin'emon gathers up most of his main allies to discuss the raid plan. Meanwhile, at Onigashima, Kaido and Big Mom make a stunning declaration!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A New Alliance?! Kaido’s Army Gathers!

programme.title: Kin'emon, Momonosuke, and the others can't fight back tears when they hear that Hiyori is alive. Zoro is stunned by Enma's demonic power and its ties to him.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Ticking Down to the Great Battle! The Straw Hats Go into Combat Mode!

programme.title: The resolution that passed the Reverie and the incidents surrounding the conference stun people all over the world and corner the Seven Warlords of the Sea. Meanwhile, a Navy captain Koby secretly contacts someone who is currently in the Land of Wano.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Big News! An Incident That Will Affect the Seven Warlords!

programme.title: Admiral Issho and Fleet Admiral Sakazuki argue over the abolition of the Seven Warlord system and the alliance of the two Emperors of the Sea. Meanwhile, ex-Fleet Admiral Sengoku teaches the young Navy soldiers about the legendary Rocks Pirates.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Legendary Battle! Garp and Roger!

programme.title: On the day of the Fire Festival, Orochi leaves the mainland of the Land of Wano heading for Onigashima where a big banquet will take place.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Rendezvous Port! The Land of Wano Act Three Begins!

programme.title: The night before the great battle, Orochi orders the destruction of the Sunny along with some bridges across the country to block Akazaya samurai's allies from their rendezvous.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Number-One Samurai in the Land of Wano! Here comes Kozuki Oden!

programme.title: When the angry mountain god, the giant boar, almost kills Kin'emon, Oden steps in. Kin'emon is impressed when he sees Oden's strength and pledges his life to serve him.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Tearfully Swearing Allegiance! Oden and Kin'emon!

programme.title: Oden transforms the wild land of Kuri into a habitable region and is made Daimyo over it. Then he meets Kawamatsu the Kappa and the two Minks, Dogstorm and Cat Viper, who become his followers like the others.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Changing Destiny! The Whitebeard Pirates Cast Ashore!

programme.title: Whitebeard and his crew dock at one of the ports in the Land of Wano with their broken ship and the news excites Oden. He runs to the port and asks Whitebeard to let him get on board the ship but the request is rejected.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Oden's journey finally begins. He is in awe of all the things that he has never seen before. And for the first time in his life, he becomes a wanted person and makes the headlines which catches the eye of a high-profile figure.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Whitebeard's Little Brother! Oden's Great Adventure!

programme.title: In the Land of Wano, the Shogun Sukiyaki falls critically ill and names Orochi proxy Shogun until Oden returns in case he dies.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Roger is amazed when he finds out that Oden can read the script on the Ponegliff since he believes it will guide him to the last, undiscovered island where no man has ever been.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Singing out loud, the Roger Pirates continue on with their journey. They soar up to the island above the clouds and go down into the deep sea to get to the island at the sea bottom.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Oden and the Roger Pirates head for the Land of Wano to obtain a copy of the Road Ponegliff. Oden sees Kin'emon and the others for the first time in years, but he immediately returns to the sea leaving his wife and children behind.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The King of the Pirates is Born! Arriving at the Last Island!

programme.title: After reaching Laugh Tale, Roger declares the disbanding of his pirate group and disembarks first. Oden gets dropped off at the Land of Wano and reunites with his family and retainers.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: To the Land of Wano! The Roger Pirates Disband!

programme.title: Enraged by Orochi's tyrannical acts, Oden raids his castle in the Flower Capital and points his sword at Orochi. However, hours later, people who were waiting for Oden to come out after defeating Orochi see the unexpected.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Sad News! The Opening of the Great Pirate Era!

programme.title: Oden keeps dancing naked in the Flower Capital and losing all the trust of the people. One day, Orochi comes to Kuri and reveals his evil plan for the Land of Wano.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Raid! Oden and the Akazaya Nine!

programme.title: Kaido comes to the mainland along with his troops to fight against Oden and the Akazaya samurai who were on their way to raid Kaido's mansion. Even though Oden's group are unprepared and outnumbered, they fight hard to save the future of the Land of Wano.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The End of the Battle! Oden vs. Kaido!

programme.title: Oden and the Akazaya members are sentenced to death by boiling in a pot. Oden asks for a chance to survive which is accepted by Kaido. Then, Oden enters the boiling pot holding his retainers over his head.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Boiled to Death! Oden's One-hour Struggle!

programme.title: As Oden continues trying to survive in the boiling pot holding his retainers over his head, people learn the truth from Shinobu and get shocked. At the same time, Oden tells his retainers the importance of opening the borders of the Land of Wano.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Oden Wouldn't Be Oden If It Wasn't Boiled!

programme.title: As Kin'emon and the others run to Oden Castle to save Oden's family, the castle is set on fire and Kaido attacks Toki and her children.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Castle on Fire! The Fate of the Kozuki Clan!

programme.title: The day of the Fire Festival has finally come and the whole army is now getting ready to head for Onigashima to raid Kaido!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Back to the Present Day! 20 Years Later!

programme.title: The Straw Hats and thousands of allies who were supposed to be there are nowhere to be found, but Kin'emon and the others decide to set sail to the stormy sea in a small boat.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Sea Is For Pirates! Raid! To Onigashima!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Though the tycoon Steel had replaced all his bodily organs with artificial organs to live, he's told that he only has a week to live. There is only one way he could prolong his life, which is to receive a brain transplant and he wants Lupin's Brain.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Famous gourmand and field mice scientist Salmon Whitney is also known as being the chairman of a Canadian diamond mining operation. Lupin is after his diamonds, which will go on auction in Paris.
programme.sub-title: The Wolf Runs and the Pig Rolls

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Coaxed by Fujiko, Lupin decides to steal the diamond chandelier at the Kremlin Palace. He disguises himself as Zenigata and infiltrates the palace, but government police soldier Natasha captures him and throws him in the slammer.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: England's Lord Weather provokes Lupin with a bet, and dares him to steal Red Arrow away from him. Lupin takes the challenge as it's a matter of pride, but Jigen wants no part of it because he and Weather are gambling buddies.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Miami Bank is on the verge of bankruptcy after its last customers closed their accounts. The bank manager Garlic devises a plan to revive the bank, and drums up news that his bank had been raided by Lupin; he also asks Lupin to really do it.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Thief brothers Nanja-Monja have been in the business since the days of Arsène Lupin; they decide to induct Lupin as a tourist attraction for the Republic of Karchina. But first they abduct Fujiko.
programme.sub-title: Hair Breadth Rescue Operation for Fujiko

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Fujiko joins Lupin and gang who are camping and cooking Sukiyaki; people are hunting Fujiko, and gunfire is exchanged. Fujiko gets captured and Lupin's Sukiyaki meal gets ruined, but he finds an atomic bomb's detonator plug inside of the Sukiyaki bowl.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Genius prodigy boy Romanoff has ten doctorates from Russia's Public Academy; blustering that no greater than he exists, he challenges Lupin. Since Fujiko is involved, Lupin cannot back down; what will become of this challenge?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Fujiko is the model for Norway's famous sculptor Vingel's crystal mermaid statue; she believed when he said he would give it to her the day it was finished, but Vingel gets greedy and sells it to the mayor of the city of Bergen instead.
programme.sub-title: The Mermaid That Disappears in the Midnight Sun

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin tries to steal a bunch of diamonds from a diamond auction. But the auction auditorium is at the Marine Tower above a skyscraper, and there is only one transparent elevator to get there.
programme.sub-title: The Target is Five Hundred and Fifty Five Meters Away

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin heads to Mecca to steal Mohammed's treasure. But first he is confronted by Patra Lawrence, the grandaughter of the Lawrence of Arabia, who is the chief of Mecca's special police headquarters; how will Lupin steal the treasure now?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: As usual, Fujiko instigates Lupin and friends to go steal; this time their target is the Jovich Piano installed in a music hall built around it. There is no door large enough in the hall to carry the piano out.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin is after the shipment of raw diamonds that arrived at a harbor in Nice; he sneaks into the storage in the middle of the night but Zenigata was on to him. Lupin escapes with the help of Jigen and Goemon, but Fujiko gets captured.
programme.sub-title: To Arrest Lupin, the Mission at Highway

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A month ago, president Gappolini of one of the world's top five trading companies, had died. Gappolini bequeathed a will saying that the heir to the company presidency will be the world's finest sharpshooter and Jigen is a target.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: It's said that immense sums of money confiscated from organized crime get transported to a Swiss bank by ICPO, once a year. Naturally, Lupin wants a piece of that action, so he steals the armed security vehicle along with Zenigata in it.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The city of Grand Hexagon lies at the border of France and Spain; the city is designed with six sides. But at the center of the city is Raika Bank storing fifty tons of gold bullion; an alarm will go off if even one bullion is missing.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Robot soldier Lamda flies above the sky of Tokyo, raids a jewelry store. Its creator, professor Oyamada's daughter Maki and Lupin say that it was just a show to demonstrate the inhumanity of robots.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd: Voyage to Danger
programme.desc: Someone sent orders to assassinate Lupin. Will he survive or die trying!?

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #6 Dragon of Doom
programme.desc: On the bottom of the ocean, within the sunken Titanic, the golden dragon statue waits. When Lupin and the gang are hired to retrieve it, Goemon recognizes the dragon as one of his clan's treasures. Now, he's ready to fight his own friends to protect it!

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #7 The Pursuit of Harimao's Treasure
programme.desc: To retrieve the Harimao's Treasure, Lupin and the gang must gather three lost statues. Lupin reluctantly partners with the aging "double-O" MI-6 agent Sir Archer and his granddaughter Diana to gather the statues.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #8 The Secret of Twilight Gemini
programme.desc: As Lupin's mentor Don Dolune lies on his deathbed, he hands the master thief a gift: the diamond named Twilight. But it's only half of the treasure-the other half of the Twilight can be found in Morocco…

programme.title: Ultraviolet, (2006, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Milla Jovovich, Cameron Bright Nick Chinlund and William Fichtner star in this theatrical set in the late 21st century, where some humans have been modified genetically by a vampire-like disease and the world is pushed to the brink of worldwide civil war.

programme.title: Universal Soldier, (1992, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A woman reporter discovers a Defense Department project to create androids from the bodies of Vietnam soldiers, to be then used as an elite anti-terrorism unit.

programme.title: The Crow, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: Visually stunning and action-packed, this hit movie, based on the comic book series, follows the return from the grave of a young rock guitarist who, along with his fiancée, is brutally killed by a ruthless gang of criminals.

programme.title: Punisher: War Zone, (2008, Comic Books and Superheroes)
programme.desc: Continuing his crusade to punish violent criminals in America, former FBI agent Frank Castle arrives in New York to take on a scarred villain who plots to take control of the underworld.

programme.title: Pixels, (2015, Comedy)
programme.desc: Former best friends must join forces and take the battle from the consoles to the streets when an army of aliens attacks Earth with massive video game characters.

programme.title: The Core, (2003, Science fiction)
programme.desc: The Earth has stopped rotating because of a change in the planet's core temperature. To restore the normal temperature, astronauts must travel to the center and detonate a nuclear bomb before the core superheats and destroys all life on the surface.

programme.title: Mad Max, (1980, Action)
programme.desc: Max and the gang's worlds converge when the gang wants Max as badly as he wants them, especially after they target him for the death of their former leader.

programme.title: Ultraviolet, (2006, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Milla Jovovich, Cameron Bright Nick Chinlund and William Fichtner star in this theatrical set in the late 21st century, where some humans have been modified genetically by a vampire-like disease and the world is pushed to the brink of worldwide civil war.

programme.title: The Big Country, (1958, Western)
programme.desc: Burl Ives earned a Best Supporting Actor Oscar for his portrayal of a family patriarch involved in a bitter land feud in this explosive western drama that also features a sumptuous musical score.

programme.title: The Man Who Shot Liberty Valance, (1962, Western)
programme.desc: Jimmy Stewart plays the bungling but charming big-city lawyer determined to rid the fair village of Shinbone of its number one nuisance and bad man: Liberty Valance.

programme.title: Hang 'Em High, (1968, Western)
programme.desc: Clint Eastwood stars in this brazen tale about a rampaging band of vigilantes who make two mistakes: they hang the wrong man and they don't finish the job. Inger Stevens, Pat Hingle, Bruce Dern & Dennis Hopper co-star in this action-packed western.

programme.title: Hud, (1963, Western)
programme.desc: Hud Bannon (Paul Newman) is the rebellious son of a respectable rancher who’s continually at odds with his aging father. Patricia Neal and Melvyn Douglas co-star, in their Oscar®-winning roles.

programme.title: The Missouri Breaks, (1976, Western)
programme.desc: Marlon Brando and Jack Nicholson ignite the screen in this rousing story of a wealthy Montana rancher who hires a professional killer to track down a gang of horse thieves.

programme.title: Hour Of The Gun, (1967, Western)
programme.desc: Director John Sturges presents a reworking of the Wyatt Earp/Doc Holliday legend and the struggle for political control of Tombstone, with a marvelous trio of antagonists: James Garner as Earp, Jason Robards as Holliday, and Robert Ryan as Clanton.

programme.title: The Halliday Brand, (1957, Western)
programme.desc: A western about a young man's (Joseph Cotten) disillusionment with his father (Ward Bond), a corrupt sheriff. When his dad turns away from the lynching of his sister's lover, the boy rebels and his father declares him an 'outlaw.'

programme.title: Jackass Presents: Bad Grandpa, (2013, Comedy)
programme.desc: Johnny Knoxville reprises his jackass role as 86-year-old Irving Zisman in the story of an old man saddled with the care of his grandson. The two hustle their way across America on an outrageous road trip pranking unsuspecting, real-life people.

programme.title: Jackass: The Movie, (2002, Comedy)
programme.desc: All the jackasses you love from the MTV series are back performing stunts no one would let them pull on television.

programme.title: Jackass Number Two, (2006, Comedy)
programme.desc: Prepare yourself for fits of uncontrollable laughter and waves of nausea as the guys launch their battered bodies into an onslaught of absurd situations.

programme.title: Jackass 3, (2010, Comedy)
programme.desc: The jackass guys are back, so brace yourself for unbelievable and totally explicit stunts from the idiots you've come to know and love from a safe and sanitary distance!

programme.desc: Johnny Knoxville reprises his jackass role as 86-year-old Irving Zisman in the story of an old man saddled with the care of his grandson. The two hustle their way across America on an outrageous road trip pranking unsuspecting, real-life people.

programme.title: With Maggie's map, Gabriel and Aaron search for food and supplies to bring back to Alexandria; checking out one more location, they chance upon a stash; faith is broken and optimism is fragmented when they are put to the ultimate test.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Eugene, Ezekiel, Yumiko, and Princess are captured and separated by the mysterious troopers that surrounded them at the rail yard; claustrophobic with mounting anxiety, Princess struggles with memories of her traumatic past and plans to escape.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: At the lowest point in their friendship, Daryl and Carol come to a fork in the road and head their separate ways; Carol returns to Alexandria, while Daryl stays on the road, each going into their own type of survival mode.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: With Maggie back at Alexandria, Carol takes Negan on a journey to minimize the increasing tension; here, Negan reflects on his late wife, Lucille, and the events that led him to this point.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Norman Reedus and actor Kim Coates reunite to ride through Georgia; together they reminisce about how far they've come in their careers and what it means to be part of The Walking Dead family.
programme.desc: Ride With Norman Reedus
programme.sub-title: Walking Dead Country With Kim Coates

programme.title: Norman Reedus and Robert Patrick ride through Georgia from Athens to Atlanta; together they learn about Georgia's musical history, and what it means to get a second chance in life.
programme.desc: Ride With Norman Reedus

programme.title: Carol maps a path toward Daryl that forces her to confront her past; Daryl, Isabelle, and Laurent struggle to define their roles at the Nest, under the watchful supervision of Losang; Daryl and Nesters launch a rescue mission for Fallou and Emile.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead: Daryl Dixon
programme.sub-title: The Book of Carol: La Gentillesse Des Étrangers

programme.title: Carol and Ash take an unexpected detour during their journey to find Daryl; Daryl, Isabelle, and Sylvie uncover a dark new threat at the Nest. Losang's faith is tested.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead: Daryl Dixon
programme.sub-title: The Book of Carol: Moulin Rouge

programme.title: Carol's hunt for information leads her to dangerous places and a new set of horrors; Daryl, Isabelle, and Fallou race to save one of their own; Pouvoir regroups.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead: Daryl Dixon

programme.title: Pouvoir attacks the Nest and Losang and Isabelle confront each other.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead: Daryl Dixon
programme.sub-title: The Book of Carol: Le Paradis Pour Toi

programme.title: Old friends and enemies realign in surprising ways as a new faction of survivors from the Nest and Pouvoir hunt down Laurent; Daryl struggles to forgive himself and Carol's lies come to a head.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead: Daryl Dixon
programme.sub-title: The Book of Carol: Vouloir, C'est Pouvoir

programme.title: An exit strategy is charted from France; the Rooftop Community helps map a new plan for the future.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead: Daryl Dixon
programme.sub-title: The Book of Carol: Au Revoir Les Enfants

programme.title: A chance encounter provides a potential way home; Daryl makes a tough decision.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead: Daryl Dixon

programme.title: Rick searches for his family after emerging from a coma; Morgan and Duane help teach Rick the new rules for survival.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Rick unknowingly causes a group of survivors to be trapped by walkers; Rick must confront an enemy more dangerous than the undead.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Rick goes back to Atlanta to save a man's life; Lori and Shane deal with the surprise return of someone they thought was dead.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Another group of survivors threatens Rick, Daryl, T-Dog and Glenn, sending Rick's mission to Atlanta awry; Jim becomes unhinged back at camp.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Minako receives a surprise visit from Katarina, Minako’s former partner. A tragic incident forced them to go their separate ways.
programme.sub-title: Sailor Venus's Past: Minako's Tragic Love

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Sailor Moon and the other Sailor Guardians appear to have a falling-out. But it’s all part of the plan to locate the enemy’s hideout.
programme.sub-title: Usagi Abandoned: The Falling-Out of the Sailor Guardians

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Sailor Venus finds the Dark Kingdom's hideout. The Sailor Guardians fall into Kunzite’s trap, which hurls them into the past.
programme.sub-title: Usagi's Awakening: A Message from the Distant Past

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The Sailor Guardians head into the Arctic Circle. Queen Beryl sends the DD Girls. The Sailor Guardians fall as they try to defeat the DD Girls.
programme.sub-title: Death of the Sailor Guardians: The Tragic Final Battle

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Sailor Moon attempts to free Endymion from Queen Beryl’s control. Sailor Moon is forced to fight the man she loves.
programme.sub-title: Usagi's Eternal Wish: A Brand New Life

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Having lost all memory of being Sailor Moon, Usagi now lives her life as an ordinary girl.
programme.sub-title: Moon Returns: The Mysterious Aliens Appear

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Sailor Moon finds herself facing new enemies from outer space. The two aliens disguise themselves as humans to go after other human energy.
programme.sub-title: For Love and for Justice: Sailor Guardians Once Again

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi, Mako, and Ami see a boy attacked by one of Ail and An’s Cardian monsters. To Mako’s surprise, the boy turns out to be her childhood friend.
programme.sub-title: For Whom Is the White Rose? The Moonlight Knight Appears

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi goes to a virtual reality arcade in the Juban District, where she unexpectedly runs into Mamoru, as well as Seijuro and Natsumi.
programme.sub-title: Usagi's Crisis: The Tiara Stops Working

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and her friends are enjoying the cherry blossoms when the Cardian Leshy attacks. The Sailor Guardians are caught.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Minako befriends a little girl named Mie who is a huge fan of Sailor Moon. Meanwhile, Ail and An send a Cardian to steal energy from young children.
programme.sub-title: The Targeted Kindergarteners: Venus to the Rescue

programme.title: Sailor Moon
